price: Tí kì í bá ṣe ti oore àjùlọ Allāhu àti ìkẹ́ Rẹ̀ lórí yín ní ilé ayé àti ní ọ̀run ni, dájúdájú ìyà ńlá ìbá fọwọ́ bà yín nípa ohun tí ẹ̀ ń sọ kiri ní ìsọkúsọ.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمَسَّكُمۡ فِي مَآ أَفَضۡتُمۡ فِيهِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
